example.parse: (S (NP-TPC-1 (NOUN+NSUFF_FEM_SG+CASE_DEF_NOM حيات) (NP (POSS_PRON_3FS ها))) (VP (PV+PVSUFF_SUBJ:3FS كانت) (NP-SBJ (-NONE- *T*-1)) (ADJP-PRD (ADJ+NSUFF_FEM_SG+CASE_INDEF_ACC غنية) (PP (PREP ب) (NP (DET+NOUN المعاني) (DET+ADJ+NSUFF_FEM_SG+CASE_DEF_GEN الجميلة))) (PP (PREP ك) (NP (NOUN+NSUFF_FEM_SG+CASE_INDEF_GEN حديقة) (NP (NP (NOUN+NSUFF_FEM_SG+CASE_INDEF_GEN ممتلئة)) (PP (PREP ب) (NP (NOUN+CASE_INDEF_GEN الوان) (PUNC ") (ADJ+NSUFF_FEM_SG+CASE_INDEF_GEN زاهية) (PUNC ")))))))))
